channel.title: RS World Finder

item.title: RS World Finder
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Well, regex showed me a better way, <3 Regex!

[code]import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLConnection;
import java.util.regex.Matcher;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

public class URLFinder {
public static void main(String… args) {
Pattern p = Pattern.compile("(\d+),(\d+),(\d+),"(\w+)",(\d+),(\d+)");
String toSearch = getContent();
Matcher m = p.matcher(toSearch);
while(m.find()) {
String prefix = m.group(4);
System.out.println("World: " + Integer.parseInt(m.group(1)));
System.out.println("Prefix: " + prefix);
System.out.println("Members: " + (Integer.parseInt(m.group(2)) == 1));
System.out.println("Players: " + Integer.parseInt(m.group(5)));
System.out.println("Available: " + (Integer.parseInt(m.group(3)) == 0));
System.out.println();
}
}

public static String getContent() {
	try {
		URL url = new URL("http://www.runescape.com/slj.ws?lores.x=413&lores.y=240&plugin=0");
		URLConnection urlc = url.openConnection();
		DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(urlc.getInputStream());
		byte[] b = new byte[urlc.getContentLength()];
		dis.readFully(b);
		dis.close();

		return new String(b);
	} catch(IOException e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
		return "";
	}
}

}[/code]

item.title: RS World Finder
item.dc:creator: @k00dr k00dr
item.description:
@k00dr wrote:

This is something I put together

[code]import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;

import java.net.URL;

import java.util.LinkedList;
import java.util.List;

import java.util.regex.Matcher;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

import javax.swing.text.Segment;

public final class WorldInfo {

public final static List getWorlds(char[] buffer) throws IOException {

if(buffer == null)
  buffer = new char[0xffff];

InputStreamReader reader = new InputStreamReader(new URL(WORLD_SELECTION).openStream());
int length = 0;
for(int space = buffer.length, chunk; (chunk = reader.read(buffer, length, space)) != -1; ) {
  length += chunk;
  space -= chunk;
}
reader.close();

return parseWorlds(new Segment(buffer, 0, length));

}

public final static List parseWorlds(CharSequence s) {

LinkedList<WorldInfo> list = new LinkedList<WorldInfo>();

for(Matcher matcher = Pattern.compile(FUNCTION_PATTERN).matcher(s); matcher.find(); )
  list.add(new WorldInfo(matcher));

return list;

}

public int worldNumber;

public int payToPlay;

public int serverStatus;

public String subdomain;

public int playerCount;

public int countryCode;

public WorldInfo(Matcher matcher) {
worldNumber = Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(1));
payToPlay = Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(2));
serverStatus = Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(3));
subdomain = matcher.group(4);
playerCount = Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(5));
countryCode = Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(6));
}

public final int getWorldNumber() {
return worldNumber;
}

public final boolean isFreeToPlay() {
return payToPlay == FREE_TO_PLAY;
}

public String getStatus() {

switch(serverStatus) {

  case SERVER_ONLINE:
    return "online";

  case SERVER_OFFLINE:
    return "offline";

  case SERVER_FULL:
    return "full";

  default:
    throw new RuntimeException("invalid server status");
}

}

public String getServer() {
String s;
return new StringBuffer(14 + (s = subdomain).length()).append(s).append(".runescape.com").toString();
}

public String getCountry() {

switch(countryCode) {

  case COUNTRY_US_WEST_1:
  case COUNTRY_US_WEST_2:
  case COUNTRY_US_WEST_3:
  case COUNTRY_US_WEST_5:
  case COUNTRY_US_EAST_2:
  case COUNTRY_US_CENTRAL_3:
  case COUNTRY_US_CENTRAL_2:
  case COUNTRY_US_CENTRAL_1:
  case COUNTRY_US_WEST_4:
  case COUNTRY_US_EAST_1:
  case COUNTRY_US_EAST_3:
    return "United States";

  case COUNTRY_UK_2 :
  case COUNTRY_UK_1:
    return "United Kingdom";

  case COUNTRY_CANADA_EAST:
  case COUNTRY_CANADA_WEST:
    return "Canada";

  case COUNTRY_NETHERLANDS:
    return "Netherlands";

  case COUNTRY_AUSTRALIA:
    return "Australia";

  case COUNTRY_SWEDEN:
    return "Sweden";

  case COUNTRY_FINLAND:
    return "Finland";

  default:
    return "Unknown";
}

}

public String toString() {
return getServer();
}

public final static int FREE_TO_PLAY = 0;
public final static int PAY_TO_PLAY = 1;

public final static int SERVER_ONLINE = 0;
public final static int SERVER_OFFLINE = 1;
public final static int SERVER_FULL = 2;

public final static int COUNTRY_US_WEST_1 = 0;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_WEST_2 = 1;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_WEST_3 = 2;
public final static int COUNTRY_UK_2 = 3;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_WEST_5 = 4;
public final static int COUNTRY_UK_1 = 5;
public final static int COUNTRY_CANADA_EAST = 6;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_EAST_2 = 7;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_CENTRAL_3 = 8;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_CENTRAL_2 = 9;
public final static int COUNTRY_NETHERLANDS = 10;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_CENTRAL_1 = 11;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_WEST_4 = 12;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_EAST_1 = 13;
public final static int COUNTRY_US_EAST_3 = 14;
public final static int COUNTRY_AUSTRALIA = 15;
public final static int COUNTRY_SWEDEN = 16;
public final static int COUNTRY_CANADA_WEST = 17;
public final static int COUNTRY_FINLAND = 18;

private final static String WORLD_SELECTION = “http://www.runescape.com/slj.ws”;
private final static String FUNCTION_PATTERN = “\w+(,(\d+),(\d+),”(\w+)",(\d+),(\d+)[)];";

}[/code]

item.title: RS World Finder
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Not sure if this goes here or in the other section so move it if it’s needed.

This will either List all the open worlds (not full) or return the URL of a world you specify (As long as it’s not full)

Syntax:
java URLFinder 15 this will find the URL of world 15
OR
java URLFinder all this will list all the non-full worlds, and the URL for it.

preview of it listing all worlds: http://rafb.net/p/SEo6SK86.html

preview of it listing 1 world:

World URL: http://se5.runescape.com/l1,p0,j0
World: 65

[code=Java]import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLConnection;
import java.util.Scanner;
import java.util.regex.Matcher;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

public class URLFinder {
public static void main(String… args) {
Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
System.out.print(“What world? (“all” for a list of worlds): “);
String world = s.next();
Pattern p = null;
if(world.contains(“all”))
p = Pattern.compile(”<a href=”(.)">World (.)");
else
p = Pattern.compile("<a href="(.*)">World " + Integer.parseInt(world) + “”);

	String toSearch = getContent();
	Matcher m = p.matcher(toSearch);

	while(m.find()) {
		String found = m.group();
		
		int quote = found.indexOf("\"") + 1;
		int quote2 = found.indexOf("\"", quote);
		
		String urlForWorld = found.substring(quote, quote2);
		int World = found.indexOf("World") + 1;
		World = found.indexOf(" ", World);
		
		int end = found.indexOf("</a>", World + 1);
		int theWorld = Integer.parseInt(found.substring(World, end).trim());
		System.out.println("World URL: " + urlForWorld);
		System.out.println("World: " + theWorld + "\n\n");	
	}
}

public static String getContent() {
	try {
		URL url = new URL("http://www.runescape.com/sln.ws?lores.x=1&plugin=0");
		URLConnection urlc = url.openConnection();
		DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(urlc.getInputStream());
		byte[] b = new byte[urlc.getContentLength()];
		dis.readFully(b);
		dis.close();
		
		return new String(b);
	} catch(IOException e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
		return "";
	}
}

}[/code]

Newer One (Thanks, regex!)

[code]import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLConnection;
import java.util.regex.Matcher;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

public class URLFinder {
public static void main(String… args) {
Pattern p = Pattern.compile("(\d+),(\d+),(\d+),"(\w+)",(\d+),(\d+)");
String toSearch = getContent();
Matcher m = p.matcher(toSearch);
while(m.find()) {
String prefix = m.group(4);
System.out.println("World: " + Integer.parseInt(m.group(1)));
System.out.println("Prefix: " + prefix);
System.out.println("Members: " + (Integer.parseInt(m.group(2)) == 1));
System.out.println("Players: " + Integer.parseInt(m.group(5)));
System.out.println("Available: " + (Integer.parseInt(m.group(3)) == 0));
System.out.println();
}
}

public static String getContent() {
	try {
		URL url = new URL("http://www.runescape.com/slj.ws?lores.x=413&lores.y=240&plugin=0");
		URLConnection urlc = url.openConnection();
		DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(urlc.getInputStream());
		byte[] b = new byte[urlc.getContentLength()];
		dis.readFully(b);
		dis.close();

		return new String(b);
	} catch(IOException e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
		return "";
	}
}

}[/code]

Any comments/suggestions are welcome, I’d like to know if I can do this a better way, because it does seem slow lol. Thanks anyone who helps
